Metadata.Title: Bring your own weapons day
Metadata.Description: Good morning 47We have received intel that 5 people here at haven are planning on eliminating the owners, to do satanic rituals on their corpses later on. For obvious reasons we cant let that happen. We dont want to leave any traces of us bei ng here, so you will have to bring some of your personal weapons to eliminate these lunatics. One of your weapon includes lethal poison, which might prove usefull later on.
